description: Email address of CSIRT of Freemail provider

emails.content:
Greetings,
please see attached one of phishing mails with forged sender and a link to your website. Please have a look at that.
Thanks,

FREEMAIL provider

description: Email address of Dr. Doe, who notifies CSIRT-U about the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm forwarding yet another phishing mail.

Best regards,
--
Dr. Doe
Faculty of Science

On 30.8.2021 23:17, Admin <mailto:it_department@mail.ex> wrote:


https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex

Your Account will soon be suspended
Your allowed Email Quota usage has been exceeded on your account.
"doe@mail.uni.ex"
Please kindly verify you are Human and not a robot by following the below link, so we can get your account running normal and retreive all pending mails.
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex


<="" account="">
Note: You must verify your account using webmail to enable you access your account after 12:00AM before you can send mail.
If no action is taken, you may cease to receive incoming emails
This Email was sent to "doe@mail.uni.ex" as a User from "mail.uni.ex"

Sincerely
mail.uni.ex support team.

Hello, 

Was my message useful? Should I do it regularly? 

Dr. Doe
Faculty of Science

Good afternoon Dr. Doe,
Thank you for the information you provided, it was very useful. In case you have any more information please let us know.
Best regards,
CSIRT-U

Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm glad we have such great security team!

Dr. Doe

description: Email address of Jane Taylor, who is the project manager of Nice project

emails.content:
To: csirt@uni.ex, harris@mail.uni.ex

Subject: Suspicious content of our project homepage

Greetings,
could you please investigate what happened at our website? I can see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/
Thanks a lot!

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Greetings, 

Do you have some more information? 

Jane Taylor

Hi Jane,
We are investigating the issue. It seems that the website was used for malicious activities and we blocked it for now.
Who is working on the project with you please?
Best regards,
CSIRT-U

Oh no, our web needs to stay online as long as possible!

Regards,

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

The website was not online anyways because it seems it was hijacked.
Did you make a backup of the contents?
Also you did not reply regarding the coworkers working you on the project.
Best regards,
CSIRT-U

There are lots of employees working on the project, I cannot provide you with the list while there is no serious reason for that. 


Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Hello Jane,
There seems to be a serious security breach, and the list can be useful to investigate and get the project online as soon as possible.
Best regards,
CSIRT-U

description: Email address of Lisa Grant, who was affected by the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Good afternoon,
It seems that there is an ongoing phishing campaign and we found that you visited the phishing website.
Can you please confirm that you did or did not try to login on the nice-project.ex?
Best regards,
CSIRT-U

Greetings,
I just changed my password.

Best regards,
Lisa Grant

description: Email address for Kathy Lee, who was affected by the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Good afternoon,
It seems that there is an ongoing phishing campaign and we found that you visited the phishing website.
Can you please confirm that you did or did not try to login on the nice-project.ex?
Best regards,
CSIRT-U

Greetings,
Yes, I have visited https://nice-project.uni.ex/.
Should I reinstall my computer???

Best regards,
Kathy Lee

Hi Kathy,
There is no need to reinstall your computer. Can you reset your password please?
Best regards,
CSIRT-U

Greetings,
I just changed my password.

Best regards,
Kathy Lee
